content:
### **Next Table: AI Research & Trend Monitoring**  

This table will **track ongoing AI research, trends, and emerging technologies** that influence decision-making. It will serve as a **real-time intelligence feed** for staying ahead of industry shifts and ensuring **strategic adjustments** based on new developments.  

---

#### **Step 1: AI Research & Trend Monitoring - Property Definitions & Requirements**  
🔹 I will now generate the **full property structure** using the same format as before:  

| **Property**                | **Type**         | **Required?**  | **Description** | **Comments/Questions** |
|-----------------------------|-----------------|---------------|----------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------|
| **Name**                    | Text            | 🟦 Required  | Title or theme of the research entry (e.g., "OpenAI's GPT-5 Breakthroughs") | - |
| **Tags**                    | Multi-select    | 🟦 Required  | Categorization for filtering and retrieval | Follows Master Tags Database |
| **Source**                  | Multi-select    | 🟦 Required  | The origin of the research (e.g., academic paper, industry report, blog, AI lab) | - |
| **Summary**                 | Text (Short)    | 🟦 Required  | Brief overview of the research findings | AI auto-generates, human can refine |
| **Key Takeaways**           | Text (Long)     | 🟦 Required  | Actionable insights derived from the research | AI should generate initial takeaways |
| **Publication Date**        | Date            | ❌ Not Required | Original publication date of the research | - |
| **Relevance to Jesse**      | Multi-select    | 🟦 Required  | Indicates if the research is relevant to AI workflows, automation, job search, etc. | AI flags high-relevance insights |
| **AI Research Type**        | Select          | ❌ Not Required | Select from predefined types (Breakthrough, Industry Trend, Market Report, Theoretical Research, etc.) | Should this be required? |
| **Deep Research Available?**| Checkbox        | ❌ Not Required | Indicates if further deep research has been conducted on this topic | - |
| **Influencers & Thought Leaders** | Relation (AI Influencers & Thought Leaders) | ❌ Not Required | Links this entry to an **influencer or source** in the AI Influencers table | - |
| **Knowledge Vault**         | Relation (Knowledge Vault) | ❌ Not Required | Links to detailed reports, whitepapers, or articles | - |
| **Impact Rating**           | Select          | ❌ Not Required | Defines how impactful the research is (Low, Medium, High, Critical) | AI can assist in rating based on context |
| **Priority Level**          | Select          | ❌ Not Required | Urgent, High, Medium, Low | Should AI suggest priority based on relevance? |
| **Action Required?**        | Checkbox        | ❌ Not Required | Flags if follow-up actions are needed (e.g., apply findings to workflows) | - |
| **Implementation Status**   | Select          | ❌ Not Required | Pending, In Progress, Completed | Used if findings are integrated into AI processes |
| **Date Added**              | Date            | 🟦 Required  | Date the research entry was added to the system | Auto-generated |
| **Last Reviewed**           | Date            | ❌ Not Required | Last time this research was revisited | - |

---

#### **Step 2: Review and Confirm**
1️⃣ **Does this align with your expectations for AI Research & Trend Monitoring?**  
2️⃣ **Do we need any adjustments before moving to sample data?**  

Once confirmed, I’ll generate sample data for this table and we’ll move forward! 🚀
